newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL tin ends steady on London's gains.
newsitem.headline: KL tin ends steady on London's gains.

text.p: Malaysia's tin price closed unchanged at 15.00 ringgit ($6.02) a kg after a brief trading session as both bids and offers were evenly balanced.
Traders said the market was supported by overnight gains on the London Metal Exchange (LME) and buying from European and local interests.
"The market seems to be stabilising at the 15 ringgit level and a further rebound is likely," said one trader.
Turnover was 141 tonnes, up from 130 on Thursday.
The local premium over LME narrowed to $35 a tonne against $45 previously.
